verses.verse: "My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H5354>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life.<s%> I will give free <S%H5800>course<s%> to my <S%H7879>complaint.<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
I will <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%> <S%H7561><s%> 'Do not condemn <S%H3045>me.<s%> Show me why you contend with <S%H7378>me.<s%>

Is it <S%H2895>good<s%> to you that you should <S%H6231>oppress,<s%> that you should <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H3018>work<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3313>smile<s%> on the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>
Do you have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh?<s%> Or do you <S%H7200>see<s%> as <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H7200>sees?<s%>
Are your <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H582>mortals,<s%> or your <S%H8141>years<s%> as <S%H582>man<s%>'s <S%H8141>years,<s%>
that you <S%H1245>inquire<s%> after my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H1875>search<s%> after my <S%H2403>sin?<s%>
Although you <S%H1847>know<s%> that I am not <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> there is no one who can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
<S%H3027><s%>"'Your hands have <S%H6087>framed<s%> me and <S%H6213>fashioned<s%> me <S%H3162>altogether,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> yet you destroy <S%H1104>me.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> I beg <S%H6213>you,<s%> that you have fashioned me as <S%H2563>clay.<s%> Will you <S%H7725>bring<s%> me into <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again?<s%>
<S%H5413>Haven't<s%> you poured me out like <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and <S%H7087>curdled<s%> me like <S%H1385>cheese?<s%>
You have <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with <S%H5785>skin<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H7753>knit<s%> me together with <S%H6106>bones<s%> and <S%H1517>sinews.<s%>
You have <S%H6213>granted<s%> me <S%H2416>life<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> Your <S%H6486>visitation<s%> has <S%H8104>preserved<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Yet you <S%H6845>hid<s%> these things in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%> I know that this is with <S%H3045>you:<s%>
if I <S%H2398>sin,<s%> then you <S%H8104>mark<s%> <S%H5352>me.<s%> You will not acquit me from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

If I am <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> <S%H480>woe<s%> to <S%H6663>me.<s%> If I am righteous, I still shall not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H7218>head,<s%> being <S%H7649>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>disgrace,<s%> and <S%H7202>conscious<s%> of my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
If my head is held <S%H1342>high,<s%> you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> me like a <S%H7826>lion.<s%> <S%H7725>Again<s%> you show yourself powerful to <S%H6381>me.<s%>
You <S%H2318>renew<s%> your <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against <S%H7235>me,<s%> and increase your <S%H3708>indignation<s%> on <S%H5978>me.<s%> <S%H2487>Changes<s%> and warfare are with <S%H6635>me.<s%>
<S%H3318><s%>"'Why, then, have you brought me forth out of the <S%H7358>womb?<s%> I wish I had given up the <S%H1478>spirit,<s%> and no <S%H5869>eye<s%> had seen <S%H7200>me.<s%>
I should have been as though I had not <S%H2986>been.<s%> I should have been carried from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave.<s%>
<S%H3117>Aren't<s%> my days <S%H4592>few?<s%> <S%H2308>Cease<s%> <S%H7896>then.<s%> Leave me alone, that I may find a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1082>comfort,<s%>
before I <S%H3212>go<s%> where I shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H776>from,<s%> to the land of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and of the shadow of <S%H6757>death;<s%>
the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5890>dark<s%> as <S%H652>midnight,<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> without any <S%H5468>order,<s%> where the <S%H3313>light<s%> is as <S%H652>midnight.<s%>'"
